title: Fidayeen
description: Set in the rebellious Indian state of Kashmir, Fidayeen follows the lives of several characters over the course of a single day. Chief among them are:Mushtaq, alias Commander Azim, the reluctant rebel compelled to enter the war owing to circumstances beyond his control.Sabira and Nausheen, ordinary Kashmir women trying to find hope and a reason to live in the midst of war.Raja, the army officer trying merely to do his duty, knowing that whatever he chooses will bring death and destruction,Loveleen, the fading journalist seeking to revive her career.Abu Hassan, the Fidayeen attacker, pledged to give his life in a cause for which Kashmir is only a stage.They, and others, are all victims in a war of someone else's making, where every day is a challenge and there is no such thing as victory.
author: Biswapriya Purkayastha
